name: FieldTest
description: Unit tests for the Field class, focusing on argument handling and position management.

methods.name: createArg
methods.signature: Arg createArg(String key, String name, int position)

test_cases.name: testDefaultOnePosition
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with 'default' arguments, where one argument has a specified position.

test_cases.name: testDefaultPositionImplied
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with 'default' arguments, where no positions are specified.

test_cases.name: testDefaultSomePositions
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with 'default' arguments, where some positions are specified.

test_cases.name: testDefaultUsingPositions
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with 'default' arguments, where positions are specified.

test_cases.name: testEmptyArgs
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with no arguments.

test_cases.name: testOverridePositionImplied
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with a 'default' argument overridden without positions specified.

test_cases.name: testOverrideSomePosition
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with a 'default' argument overridden with some positions specified.

test_cases.name: testOverrideUsingPositionA
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with a 'default' argument overridden using the 'position' property.

test_cases.name: testOverrideUsingPositionB
test_cases.description: Tests the Field class with a 'default' argument overridden using the 'position' property.
